id: Tired of being a JavaScript ignoramus? It’s time to get schooled for $39!
paragraph:
TNW uses cookies to personalize content and ads to

                            We do also share that information with third parties for
                            advertising & analytics.
                        
            by TNW Deals
            — 
                        in Offers
We’ve all got our dirty little secrets. Don’t be embarrassed. Nobody’s closet is clear of skeletons. With that established, it’s time for 99 percent of us to rise up together with one collective voice and just admit it.We don’t know what JavaScript is.Hard Fork.Yes, it’s been around for over 20 years and if you’re interested in tech, you’ve undoubtedly heard of the most popular programming language there is. But unless you’re a true code geek, you likely have no idea exactly what JavaScript does and how it’s any different from the other 100 programming terms you know, but don’t understand.Super short version: JavaScript brings web pages to life. If the page you’re viewing is anything more than some text and an image, then it’s very possible JavaScript is involved. You can go behind the veil and actually learn what JavaScript is and how to use it with this JavaScript Masterclass Bundle. It’s currently over 90 percent off right now, only $39 from TNW Deals.This package features eight courses, sporting 90 hours of training that’ll demystify JavaScript for even the most novice student. The courses include:With this instruction, you’ll soak in the basics of JavaScript as you study HTML, CSS and the code snippets that JavaScript use to make literally millions of web pages dynamic. Over this training, you’ll also dive deep into the voluminous JavaScript library known as jQuery, as well as JSON, a simple method for bringing outside web data into your pages automatically.When 95 percent of all web sites use JavaScript, it’s clearly something you need to understand. A $1,600 value, the entire bundle is on sale now for just $39 while this deal lasts.
